bibl.title: Stanley M. BURSTEIN, Graeco-Africana. Studies in the History of Greek Relations with Egypt and Nubia
bibl.note: Museum of Fine Arts, Boston Nubian expedition 1916. Christian funerary Stela. Nuri, IX-X cent. A.D. - Observations on S.E.G. II, 8883 (of the same cutter).

Stanley M. BURSTEIN, Graeco-Africana. Studies in the History of Greek Relations with Egypt and Nubia = Hellenism - Ancient, Mediaeval, Modern. 16 (New Rochelle, N.Y., 1995) pp. 221-229, 2 figg.
